title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Decisive Response to Rocket Attacks from Beit Hanoun Targeting Sderot”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces attacked a rocket launch pit in the Beit Hanoun area short time after rocket launches were identified from the area towards the city of Sderot last night (Friday).

The 215 Fire Brigade and the Air Force, in collaboration with the Gaza Division, attacked targets, including a rocket launch pit in the Beit Hanoun area in the northern Gaza Strip last night (Friday), a short time after a rocket was identified crossing from the Beit Hanoun area towards the city of Sderot and mortally wounding.

During the last day, aircraft and fighter jets from the Air Force attacked dozens of targets in support of the entrenched forces, including armed terrorists, military infrastructure, and military buildings.

The combat team of the Nahal Brigade continues to work to thwart terror in the center of the Gaza Strip, during one of the attacks the fighters identified a terrorist who posed a threat to the force in the area and neutralized him.

Attached is a video of IDF attacks in the strip: https://bit.ly/449XBsd

Attached are pictures of the forces’ activity in the strip: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC200420246585868
